item.title: Impl. live streaming system - RTMP: Introduction & Basic Handshake
item.description: Introduction RTMP Protocol is a set of these three things Handshake Check reliable stream transport Chunk Stream Multiplexing Packetizing Message Video/Audio RPC RTMP is message multiplexing protocol, not only media service. Adobeâ€™s Real Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) provides a bidirectional message multiplex service over a reliable stream transport, such as TCP [RFC0793], intended to carry parallel streams of video, audio, and data messages, with associated timing information, between a pair of communicating peers.
